alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 2:08PM MST until December 27 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts around 65 mph expected. Higher wind gusts may occur on the south side of Casper along Outer Drive. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 7 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Dangerous crosswinds are expected.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
